_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Plutonium
author: ptero@our-space.xyz
startup: if [[ grep -q nan st.txt ]]; wine cmd.exe /C \!updatePluto.bat /nogui && echo "inst" > st.txt; fi; if [[grep -q  inst st.txt]]; then wine cmd.exe /C \!start.bat /nogui; fi;

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install unzip wget ca-certificates

if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server/
fi

cd /tmp/

wget https://github.com/xerxes-at/T6ServerConfigs/archive/master.zip

unzip -n master.zip
mv /tmp/T6ServerConfigs-master/* /mnt/server/
cd /mnt/server/
rm plutonium.exe
wget https://cdn.plutonium.pw/updater/plutonium.exe
rm \!start_zm_server.bat
#rm pluto.sh
mv \!start_mp_server.bat \!start.bat
echo nan >> st.txt


echo "\n# Unofficial Pterodactyl-Plutonium Server \nThe help is not yet written please refer to garycraft@our-space.xyz or [<@478668961626587157>](paste this in discord chat) in discord" >> README.md
